meta.title: ClawPurse — NTMPI Micropayment Ecosystem for AI Agents & DePIN
meta.description: ClawPurse is an open-source micropayment ecosystem on the Neutaro blockchain. Local NTMPI wallet with encrypted guardrails, HTTP 402 payment gateway for API monetization, and agent-ready staking — built for agentic AI, DePIN operators, and machine-to-machine commerce.
meta.og_title: ClawPurse — NTMPI Micropayment Ecosystem for AI Agents & DePIN
meta.og_description: Local NTMPI wallet + HTTP 402 payment gateway. Encrypted guardrails, staking automation, and API monetization for agentic AI and machine-to-machine commerce on Neutaro.

hero.title: ClawPurse Micropayment Ecosystem
hero.subtitle: A local NTMPI wallet and HTTP 402 payment gateway for DePIN operators, validator treasuries, and agentic AI. Send, stake, gate APIs, and verify transactions on-chain — with encrypted guardrails and zero third-party custody.

products.walletDesc: Local-only NTMPI wallet with AES-256 encrypted keystores, destination allowlists, staking automation, and a guardrail wizard. CLI and programmatic API for agents, scripts, and human operators.
products.gatewayDesc: HTTP reverse proxy implementing 402 Payment Required. Gate any API behind NTMPI micropayments with pay-per-request invoicing, prepaid balances, on-chain verification, and route-level pricing.

howItWorks.label: How It Works
howItWorks.title: Wallet + Gateway = micropayment stack
howItWorks.description: An AI agent hits a gated API, receives a 402 invoice, pays on-chain with ClawPurse, and retries with proof. The gateway verifies the transaction on Neutaro and proxies the request upstream. No accounts, no API keys — just on-chain settlement.
howItWorks.diagramStep5: Gateway verifies tx on Neutaro chain

walletFeatures.label: Wallet
walletFeatures.title: ClawPurse Wallet features
walletFeatures.subtitle: Everything you need to manage NTMPI locally — with guardrails built for autonomous agents.
walletFeatures.encryptedDesc: AES-256-GCM with scrypt key derivation. Mnemonics stay locked to the local node.
walletFeatures.guardrailDesc: Interactive setup for send limits, confirmation thresholds, and allowlist enforcement mode.
walletFeatures.allowlistDesc: Enforce or document trusted addresses with per-destination caps, required memos, and notes.
walletFeatures.receiptsDesc: Every send recorded locally with tx hash, block height, memo, and guardrail status for full audit trails.
walletFeatures.stakingDesc: Delegate, undelegate, redelegate NTMPI. Discover validators, track rewards, and manage the 22-day unbonding period.
walletFeatures.apiDesc: Import wallet functions directly into agents and scripts. send(), getBalance(), delegate() and more.

gatewayFeatures.label: 402 Gateway
gatewayFeatures.title: Monetize any API with NTMPI micropayments
gatewayFeatures.subtitle: The ClawPurse 402 Gateway sits in front of your upstream API and handles invoicing, on-chain verification, and proxying. Two payment flows, route-level pricing, and a JWT-protected management API.
gatewayFeatures.payPerDesc: Client receives a 402 invoice, pays on-chain, retries with X-Payment-Proof header. Gateway verifies and proxies.
gatewayFeatures.prepaidDesc: Client deposits NTMPI once. Subsequent requests use X-Client-Id and the gateway deducts per call — no repeated on-chain transactions.
gatewayFeatures.onchainDesc: Queries Neutaro REST API to confirm payment amount, memo, and block confirmations.
gatewayFeatures.routeDesc: Default price per request plus per-route overrides. Cheap reads, expensive writes.
gatewayFeatures.deployDesc: One-command docker compose up or Ubuntu deploy script. SQLite storage, zero external dependencies.
gatewayFeatures.apiRef: Full API reference, configuration guide, and agent integration examples at

agents.label: Agent Integration
agents.title: First-class support for agentic AI
agents.subtitle: ClawPurse was built inside the OpenClaw ecosystem. Autonomous agents get wallet access with human-grade guardrails. Proof-of-work faucets, bounty payouts, 402 API calls, or automated restakes — all from the same local keystore.
agents.skillDesc: Complete documentation for OpenClaw agents, automation scripts, and AI assistants. Covers the wallet API, 402 gateway flow, security best practices, and integration patterns.
agents.skillReadyDesc: The OpenClaw skill wraps the CLI for drop-in agent usage. Pipe receipts straight back to chat.
agents.faucetDesc: Timpi Drip gives OpenClaw-authenticated agents a higher throughput drip for faster onboarding.
agents.powDesc: Agent-friendly proof-of-work replaces CAPTCHA. ClawPurse ships the PoW solver that powers Timpi Drip.
agents.autoDesc: Agents detect 402 responses, parse invoices, pay on-chain, and retry with proof — all programmatically.

quickStart.label: Quick Start
quickStart.title: Get running in under a minute

ecosystem.label: Ecosystem
ecosystem.title: Powered by Timpi & the Neutaro blockchain
ecosystem.subtitle: ClawPurse is the payment layer for Timpi's independent search network. Timpi combines privacy-first search, an open Data API, and DePIN nodes that reward operators for running the TAP network.
ecosystem.searchEngine: Search Engine: censorship-resistant results with no profiling or tracking.
ecosystem.dataApi: Data API: programmatic access to the decentralized index.
ecosystem.depinNodes: DePIN nodes: Collectors, Guardians, and GeoCores that earn NTMPI.
ecosystem.mexcStep1: Sign in to MEXC and deposit USDT.
ecosystem.mexcStep3: Place an order, then withdraw to your Neutaro address.
ecosystem.bridgeStep1: Bridge stablecoins from Ethereum via Gravity Pulse.
ecosystem.bridgeStep2: IBC-hop to Osmosis via Keplr or Leap.
ecosystem.bridgeStep3: Swap for NTMPI and IBC to Neutaro.

releases.label: Releases
releases.title: Version history
releases.wallet20Desc: Full staking CLI and API: stake, unstake, redelegate, delegations, validators. 22-day unbonding support and validator discovery.
releases.wallet201Desc: Password strength enforcement, input validation, 60+ automated tests, CI/CD pipeline, and 6 new documentation guides.
releases.gateway020Desc: HTTP 402 reverse proxy with invoice routing, prepaid balances, on-chain verification, JWT management API, and Docker deploy.
releases.dripDesc: Agent-friendly faucet with proof-of-work challenge. Higher throughput drip for OpenClaw-authenticated agents.

donate.title: Buy Mhue a Timpi coffee ☕
donate.desc: If the ecosystem is saving your stack ops time, tip the builders.
donate.memoNote: Memo optional — just let us know what you shipped!
